generalInfo.title: We are looking for a Senior Application Integration Developer (f/m/d)
generalInfo.text: Can you successfully design and build the integration landscape of tomorrow? This is your opportunity to become a member of our Technology Consulting Team. If you have a passion for technology and want to make the world a greener place, you can become a changemaker in our diverse team!

otherInfo.title: Your Tasks
list: You will analyze and design integration scenarios for various Use Cases.
You will design and develop complex integration scenarios and integrate systems and services using our portfolio of integration solutions (focusing on Microsoft).
You will continuously evaluate and improve the development process.
You will review and analyze solution designs and development to ensure that standards are met and the design integration scenario fits into the overall integration architecture.
You will work with various stakeholders in and out of feature teams and projects, building state of the art integration scenarios.
You will use your Experience and knowledge across the entire Lifecycle, train teams and share your knowledge for a better together.

otherInfo.title: Your Profile
list: You have several years of proven experience within the area of enterprise integration.
You have proven knowledge of technologies (e.g., C#, JSON, XML, REST / SOAP) and integration solutions (e.g., API, ETL, ESB).
You have proven experience and knowledge on Microsoft Integration Tools.
You have proven experience of Agile methodology, as well as design thinking with the ability to gather and collect requirements from end-users and translate them into a design/code.
You are a team player combined with a proactive attitude.
You have excellent German and English communication skills (written & spoken); additional EU languages will be a plus.

otherInfo.title: Benefits
list: Company pension scheme and company insurance worldwide.
Exclusive employee discounts and subsidized canteen.
Home Office Option in consultation with the team.
Parental leave for mothers and fathers is perfectly normal.
Additional benefits for people with a disability.
Very good working atmosphere (informal "du", colloquial atmosphere, very international teams).
